name: Aditya

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: I build responsive and user-friendly web applications using React, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI. I focus on creating seamless UI/UX experiences.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: I develop secure and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and Express.js. I also implement authentication, REST APIs.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: I design and manage databases using MongoDB.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: I create end-to-end web applications by integrating frontend, backend, and databases. My goal is to deliver high-performance, scalable web solutions.
